channel.title: A Long Time Has Passed, The New Server Is Cool, Where Did Everyone Go?
channel.description:
Hi everyone,
I came to visit and I saw that you guys made a server while I was gone and it looks pretty freaking cool. I look forward to having a go.
But, where did everyone go? There used to be hundreds of people.

item.title: A Long Time Has Passed, The New Server Is Cool, Where Did Everyone Go?

item.title: A Long Time Has Passed, The New Server Is Cool, Where Did Everyone Go?
item.dc:creator: @Tatemo Tatemo
item.description:
@Tatemo wrote:

[quote=“Ruby, post:46, topic:549871”][quote author=Tatemo link=topic=668754.msg4473338#msg4473338 date=1424370550]

Bummer. That was pretty cool looking. R-S now loads so slowly it is unusable hahaha.

I think it’s time you get a computer from this century…
I can load up RS in under 2 minutes (Minus the cache download).

Not Runescape, R-S the website which you can’t say the name of on Moparscape.
[/quote]

Rune-Server. Fight me.[/quote]

Read full topic

item.title: A Long Time Has Passed, The New Server Is Cool, Where Did Everyone Go?
item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

[quote=“Tatemo, post:44, topic:549871”][quote author=sk8rdude461 link=topic=668754.msg4473225#msg4473225 date=1424301614]

Bummer. That was pretty cool looking. R-S now loads so slowly it is unusable hahaha.

I think it’s time you get a computer from this century…
I can load up RS in under 2 minutes (Minus the cache download).
[/quote]

Not Runescape, R-S the website which you can’t say the name of on Moparscape.[/quote]

Rune-Server. Fight me.

[quote=“Fails, post:45, topic:549871”]I highly doubt anyone remembers me :rolleyes:, but I felt the need to stop by and comment on this topic. Here lately I’ve been busy with work and school and what free time I have left is dedicated to my girlfriend and family. My time on the computer has decreased significantly this past year or so, which isn’t necessarily a bad thing. I do stop by from time to time though just to see if moparscape is still standing on it’s feet.

Anyway, nice to see some of you guys again.[/quote]
Sup faggot

Read full topic

item.title: A Long Time Has Passed, The New Server Is Cool, Where Did Everyone Go?
item.dc:creator: @F_A_I_L_S Fails
item.description:
@F_A_I_L_S wrote:

I highly doubt anyone remembers me :rolleyes:, but I felt the need to stop by and comment on this topic. Here lately I’ve been busy with work and school and what free time I have left is dedicated to my girlfriend and family. My time on the computer has decreased significantly this past year or so, which isn’t necessarily a bad thing. I do stop by from time to time though just to see if moparscape is still standing on it’s feet.

Anyway, nice to see some of you guys again.

item.title: A Long Time Has Passed, The New Server Is Cool, Where Did Everyone Go?
item.dc:creator: @Tatemo Tatemo
item.description:
@Tatemo wrote:

[quote=“Jmood, post:35, topic:549871”][quote author=Tatemo link=topic=668754.msg4472991#msg4472991 date=1424163106]

Too bad Groot is being cut down in two weeks.

Also Tatemo /nick [insert generic nickname] is how you change your nickname. You can also register it by typing /msg NickServ REGISTER [password] [email]. You will get an email with an activation code that you will use to activate your account. It should also send the command to make it easier for you.

Thanks JMood. I left because my internet was misbehaving. Kept disconnecting. I did the registering thing but I never got the email hahaha.
[/quote]

When did you do that? I didn’t see anything show up in the service channel.[/quote]

Might have done it in the wrong place/disconnected when I did it. I don’t think any of my messages went through either. Oh well.

Read full topic

item.title: A Long Time Has Passed, The New Server Is Cool, Where Did Everyone Go?
item.dc:creator: @Tatemo Tatemo
item.description:
@Tatemo wrote:

[quote=“Ambokile, post:14, topic:549871”][quote author=Tatemo link=topic=668754.msg4472384#msg4472384 date=1423855164]

Remember when we made a server

“A server”? Cj, we made the best server ever. It was just a shame that every time people tried to play it turned off because Killamess didn’t know how to write skills that could be used by more than one player at a time hahahaha.[/quote]

I remember your HD server - it was cool! Especially the player houses.[/quote]

Hahahaha, the houses was a pretty cool system to write. In hindsight I hyped it a bit much considering all you could do was buy random NPC’s houses hahaha.

Yz85Racer:

[me=Yz85Racer]waves.[/me]

[quote=“Vain_, post:16, topic:549871”][quote author=sk8rdude461 link=topic=668754.msg4472335#msg4472335 date=1423825918]

Hi everyone,

I came to visit and I saw that you guys made a server while I was gone and it looks pretty freaking cool. I look forward to having a go.

But, where did everyone go? There used to be hundreds of people.

There still is ‘hundreds’

There used to be thousands… It used to be a ‘battle’ to get your help topic seen in the server help…
Now? Lol, your topic will sit on page 1 for a week.
[/quote]thats my fault because i dont help anymore lol[/quote]

Hahahaha. Staying true to your name I see.

Is anyone still hosting any decent servers? Is Silabgarza still around? The questions are endless and the answers are few.

Read full topic
item.source: A Long Time Has Passed, The New Server Is Cool, Where Did Everyone Go?
